rules.header: Welcome to DuckQuest - Shortest Path Game

content: Find the shortest path from the START node (A1) to the END node (Q2).
1. Nodes represent stops on your journey (clickable buttons).
3. Your goal is to select nodes to create the shortest path.
- 'Start a graph': Reset and randomize the graph.
- 'Check your path': Validate your chosen path.
- 'Display shortest path': View the optimal path (cheat button!).
Plan your route by looking at edge weights and node connections.
Use 'Display shortest path' sparingly to practice your skills!
